reviews.text:
Havelli heritage is a good restaurant with good ambience.

Little costly compared to other restaurants in Barwa village.

A good quality food. Price a bit high but it didn pinch because of good taste. Tandoori n lahsooni chicken I have tried... a different great taste after a long gap for me.... roti items like naan i found a bit small... so equally you need to increase in quantity.

Time to update the ratings. This one is definitely a surprise for me because the last time I was here it was not such a memorable experience.

Awesome and good :
  Being vegetarian, though my options are limited to the biryanis, kadais and gravy items, they were not disappointing. Infact, the curd rice with its 'tadka' is the best in Doha. Even on their bad days, the curd rice still tops the best from their competitors.

And, make sure you try their samosas. Hot, fresh and delicious. The chutneys are simply awesome. 

Avg. and Bad:
   Thali option is decent. But at times a little oily. 
   I did not like that the food sometimes is not consistent in taste. They fluctuate from awesome to Avg sometimes.

Owing to recent experiences, I decided to re-review and that too positively. It is worth it.
Food is good and also the ambience at first floor.

Students Biryani was the one of the most delicious mouth watering popular and well known Biryani of karachi city of its time  but as they build the new dining area and add much more food variety with Biryani like Fast Food Pizza B.B.Q But problem is they fail to maintain the taste of their Biryani and they are losing taste day by day and their rates are more expensive as compare to the other Restaurants
Bht he bura taste tha aaj k biryani ka. I am eating this biryani for last 2q years and today it was worst.
A very famous. student biryani centre in Karachi saddar
Ok on contemporary... Down rating down 👇🏻
They used to be good but they really lost the thing. No more good biryani.

We arrived early afternoon and asked to sit inside, there were maybe 2 guests in whole establishment. The waitress told us not possible as reserved tables, we left after food and there were still just 2 guests.
What is also poor is my friends food arrived 15 minutes before mine, she had almost finished eating before my meal arrived. How difficult for even a basic student chef or cook to start for example a steak, which takes twice time as salmon for example so both meals arrive same time. 
So not good experience and do not recommend. 
Shame as food was nice. 
Let down by poor service
One of the best lounge bars in Bishkek.

Ооо это то самое место где все как и надо. Особая атмосфера.  Вкусные блюда . Суперский кальян . А глинтвейн который я пила мне показался просто шикарным,терпким. Согревающее то что нужно в весеннее и осенние  дни. Если вы не пьющий человек. Самое то. И официанты так ненавязчиво готовы предложить все о чем вы подумали) одно из любимых мест
